statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_recall_information WHERE id = 1 AND vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
DELETE FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' AND recall_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE id = 100 AND recall_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_model WHERE model_id IN (SELECT model_id FROM vehicle_model WHERE manufacturer_id = 2);
DELETE FROM RecallReasons WHERE reason = 'Defective Parts';
DELETE FROM RecallDetails WHERE reason_id = 1 AND recall_id IN (SELECT id FROM VehicleRecalls WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota');
DELETE FROM RecallLocations WHERE recall_id = 3 AND location = 'California';
